channel.title: Amazing community
channel.description:
So I've been a member now for 16 days and one thing that stands out to me is the community of players. A lot of the guys I've met are in their late teens to early twenties but not only that, everyone just seems to inclined to help one another out. The community feels like it did when I was a child.
Anyone feel the same thing?

item.title: Amazing community
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:549063”]So I’ve been a member now for 16 days and one thing that stands out to me is the community of players. A lot of the guys I’ve met are in their late teens to early twenties but not only that, everyone just seems to inclined to help one another out. The community feels like it did when I was a child.

Anyone feel the same thing?[/quote]
People are generally nicer; however, I have come across some assholes.

After doing a druid run, I was leaving the wildy and heading up the ladder to edge. There was a pure there, training with his gmaul and his cannon to kill skeletons; however, the area is not multi combat. He was using the cannon to fight lvl 40 skeletons 1 on 1 while also using the maul. When I mentioned he should go to a multicombat zone, he stopped what he was doing and followed me for the next 10 minutes to tell me that I should delete my account, and see a psychiatrist about the abuse I recevied as a child before I kill myself.

Tl;dr pures are still assholes

Read full topic
